Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Shelf AllSmallShelf is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic Shelf of orders 2 to 5.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallShelf">
The output shelf are represented by its operation table for *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small Shelf
"IsASmallShelf" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic Shelf of orders 2 to 5. It returns true if the model is a Small Shelf, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallShelf">
